description.zh-cn: 指在“文化大革命”前夕，时任中国人民解放军总参谋长罗瑞卿被批判并撤销党政军各项职务的政治事件。
description.en: A political incident on the eve of the Cultural Revolution in which Luo Ruiqing, then Chief of the General Staff of the People's Liberation Army, was criticized and removed from all his party, government, and military posts.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的在中国大陆发生的政治运动。罗瑞卿事件被认为是其前奏之一。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China launched and led by Mao Zedong. The Luo Ruiqing incident is considered one of its preludes.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国军事领导人，曾任中共中央书记处书记、国务院副总理、中共中央军委秘书长、中国人民解放军总参谋长等职，在罗瑞卿事件中被打倒，文革后获平反。
description.en: A military leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as Secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat, Vice Premier of the State Council, Secretary-General of the CPC Central Military Commission, and Chief of the General Staff of the PLA. He was purged in the Luo Ruiqing incident and rehabilitated after the Cultural Revolution.

en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中共中央副主席、国防部长。罗瑞卿事件的主要发起者之一，后在九一三事件中死亡。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, former Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and Minister of National Defense. He was one of the main instigators of the Luo Ruiqing incident and later died in the September 13 incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，时任中共中央主席、中央军委主席。在罗瑞卿事件中作出最终决定。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, then Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He made the final decision in the Luo Ruiqing incident.

description.zh-cn: 1959年中国共产党召开的会议，会上彭德怀等人受到批判，总参谋长黄克诚也因此被打倒。
description.en: A meeting held by the Communist Party of China in 1959, during which Peng Dehuai and others were criticized, leading to the downfall of Chief of the General Staff Huang Kecheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，1959年庐山会议后被打倒，其总参谋长职务由罗瑞卿接任。
description.en: A Senior General of the People's Liberation Army who was purged after the 1959 Lushan Conference. His position as Chief of the General Staff was taken over by Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国国务院总理，曾支持任命罗瑞卿为总参谋长，并在罗瑞卿被打倒时向其传达毛泽东的指示。
description.en: Then Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, he supported the appointment of Luo Ruiqing as Chief of the General Staff and conveyed Mao Zedong's instructions to Luo when he was purged.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的妻子，在罗瑞卿事件中扮演了关键角色，直接向毛泽东汇报诬告罗瑞卿。
description.en: Lin Biao's wife, who played a key role in the Luo Ruiqing incident by directly reporting false accusations against Luo to Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，在罗瑞卿事件前与罗瑞卿政治立场相近。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China. Before the Luo Ruiqing incident, his political stance was close to Luo Ruiqing's.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，与罗瑞卿有分歧，并向毛泽东汇报罗瑞卿的问题，在批判罗瑞卿的会议上作了重要发言。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China who had disagreements with Luo Ruiqing. He reported Luo's issues to Mao Zedong and made an important speech at the meeting to criticize Luo.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，林彪集团成员之一。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army and a member of Lin Biao's faction.

nodes.id: 中共中央政治局扩大会议 (1965年)

zh-cn: 中共中央政治局扩大会议 (1965年)
en: Enlarged Meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee (1965)

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东在上海主持召开的会议，专门用于批判罗瑞卿，是罗瑞卿事件中的关键环节。
description.en: A meeting convened and chaired by Mao Zedong in Shanghai specifically to criticize Luo Ruiqing, a key event in the Luo Ruiqing incident.

description.zh-cn: 林彪与叶群之女。
description.en: Daughter of Lin Biao and Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾向毛泽东汇报罗瑞卿的问题，并在批判会议上联名发言。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, he reported Luo Ruiqing's issues to Mao Zedong and co-authored a speech at the criticism meeting.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国人民解放军空军副参谋长。
description.en: Then Deputy Chief of Staff of the PLA Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的女婿。
description.en: Son-in-law of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心。在罗瑞卿被打倒时向其传达指示，文革后在其主导下罗瑞卿获得平反。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He conveyed instructions to Luo Ruiqing when he was purged, and under his leadership, Luo was rehabilitated after the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 关于罗瑞卿错误问题的报告

zh-cn: 关于罗瑞卿错误问题的报告

description.zh-cn: 1966年由中央工作组作出的报告，将罗瑞卿定性为“篡军反党的阴谋活动”者，是其被打倒的重要文件依据。
description.en: A report issued by the Central Working Group in 1966, which labeled Luo Ruiqing as engaging in "conspiratorial activities to usurp the army and oppose the Party." It was a key document in his purge.

nodes.id: 罗瑞卿问题中央工作组会议

zh-cn: 罗瑞卿问题中央工作组会议

description.zh-cn: 由“中央工作组”在北京召开的会议，旨在揭发批判罗瑞卿，并最终形成《关于罗瑞卿同志错误问题的报告》。
description.en: A meeting convened in Beijing by the "Central Working Group" to expose and criticize Luo Ruiqing, which ultimately produced the "Report on Comrade Luo Ruiqing's Errors".

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，在批判罗瑞卿的会议上作了发言。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who spoke at the meeting to criticize Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，在批判罗瑞卿的会议上作了发言。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army who spoke at the meeting to criticize Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，在批判罗瑞卿的会议上联名发言。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who co-authored a speech at the meeting to criticize Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，在批判罗瑞卿的会议上联名发言。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who co-authored a speech at the meeting to criticize Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，因在批判罗瑞卿会议过程中的表现而受到指责。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who was criticized for his behavior during the meeting to criticize Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，参与了对彭真在批判罗瑞卿会议中表现的指责。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who participated in the criticism of Peng Zhen's behavior during the meeting to criticize Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 指林彪等人乘飞机出逃，坠毁于蒙古的事件，该事件导致林彪政治生命的终结。
description.en: Refers to the event where Lin Biao and others fled by plane and crashed in Mongolia, which ended Lin Biao's political career.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的妻子，“四人帮”成员之一，在毛泽东对罗瑞卿事件表态后，拖延为其平反。
description.en: Mao Zedong's wife and a member of the "Gang of Four." After Mao expressed his views on the Luo Ruiqing incident, she delayed Luo's rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，在毛泽东对罗瑞卿事件表态后，拖延为其平反。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. After Mao expressed his views on the Luo Ruiqing incident, he delayed Luo's rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿在事件中被打倒，被撤销所有重要职务并被隔离审查。
description.en: Luo Ruiqing was purged in the incident, removed from all important posts, and placed under isolated investigation.

description.zh-cn: 林彪提议让罗瑞卿当总参谋长，后又因罗瑞卿与其意见不合，派其妻叶群向毛泽东诬告罗瑞卿，是罗瑞卿事件的主要发起者之一。
description.en: Lin Biao proposed Luo Ruiqing for Chief of the General Staff, but later, due to disagreements, sent his wife Ye Qun to falsely accuse Luo to Mao Zedong, making him a key instigator of the Luo Ruiqing incident.

description.zh-cn: 叶群带着林彪的信和十一份材料，向毛泽东作了数小时的汇报，诬告罗瑞卿，直接促成了批判罗瑞卿的上海会议。
description.en: Ye Qun, carrying a letter from Lin Biao and eleven documents, reported to Mao Zedong for several hours, falsely accusing Luo Ruiqing, which directly led to the Shanghai Conference to criticize Luo.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东听取了对罗瑞卿的汇报后，决定并主持召开了中共中央政治局扩大会议（上海会议），对罗瑞卿进行批判，是事件的最高决策者。
description.en: After hearing reports about Luo Ruiqing, Mao Zedong decided to convene and preside over the Enlarged Politburo Meeting (Shanghai Conference) to criticize Luo, acting as the ultimate decision-maker in the incident.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英向林彪传达了毛泽东关于罗瑞卿问题的指示，并向毛泽东汇报过罗的问题。他在后续的批判会议中作了重要发言。
description.en: Ye Jianying conveyed Mao Zedong's instructions on the Luo Ruiqing issue to Lin Biao and had reported Luo's problems to Mao. He delivered an important speech at the subsequent criticism meeting.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年庐山会议后，时任中国人民解放军总参谋长黄克诚被打倒。
description.en: After the 1959 Lushan Conference, then Chief of the General Staff of the PLA Huang Kecheng was purged.

description.zh-cn: 在黄克诚被打倒后，时任国防部长林彪提议让罗瑞卿担任总参谋长。
description.en: After Huang Kecheng was purged, then Minister of National Defense Lin Biao proposed Luo Ruiqing for the position of Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 林彪策划并推动了对罗瑞卿的批判和罢免。
description.en: Lin Biao planned and promoted the criticism and dismissal of Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 文本中提到罗瑞卿与叶剑英等人有分歧。
description.en: The text mentions that Luo Ruiqing had disagreements with Ye Jianying and others.

description.zh-cn: 文本中提到罗瑞卿和贺龙等站在一起。
description.en: The text mentions that Luo Ruiqing stood together with He Long.

relationships.target: 中共中央政治局扩大会议 (1965年)

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在上海突然召开并主持了此次会议。
description.en: Mao Zedong suddenly convened and presided over this meeting in Shanghai.

relationships.source: 中共中央政治局扩大会议 (1965年)

description.zh-cn: 会议集中批判罗瑞卿，导致其会后被隔离审查。
description.en: The meeting focused on criticizing Luo Ruiqing, leading to his isolated investigation after the conference.

description.zh-cn: 与邓小平一同向罗瑞卿传达毛泽东的谈话。
description.en: Along with Deng Xiaoping, conveyed Mao Zedong's remarks to Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 与周恩来一同向罗瑞卿传达毛泽东的谈话。
description.en: Along with Zhou Enlai, conveyed Mao Zedong's remarks to Luo Ruiqing.

relationships.source: 罗瑞卿问题中央工作组会议
relationships.target: 关于罗瑞卿错误问题的报告

description.zh-cn: 该会议的最终成果是作出了《关于罗瑞卿同志错误问题的报告》。
description.en: The final outcome of this meeting was the production of the "Report on Comrade Luo Ruiqing's Errors".

relationships.source: 关于罗瑞卿错误问题的报告

description.zh-cn: 报告将罗瑞卿定性为“篡军反党”的阴谋家，导致其被撤销全部职务。
description.en: The report labeled Luo Ruiqing as a conspirator "usurping the army and opposing the Party," leading to his removal from all posts.

relationships.target: 关于罗瑞卿错误问题的报告

description.zh-cn: 为报告撰写了附件文章《彻底粉碎罗瑞卿同志篡军反党的阴谋，高举毛泽东思想的伟大红旗奋勇前进》。
description.en: Authored an appended article for the report titled "Thoroughly Smash Comrade Luo Ruiqing's Conspiracy to Usurp the Army and Oppose the Party, and March Forward Bravely Holding High the Great Red Banner of Mao Zedong Thought".

relationships.target: 关于罗瑞卿错误问题的报告

description.zh-cn: 为报告撰写了附件文章《高举毛泽东思想伟大红旗，肃清罗瑞卿同志在公安工作中散布的资产阶级毒素》。
description.en: Authored an appended article for the report titled "Hold High the Great Red Banner of Mao Zedong Thought and Eradicate the Bourgeois Poison Spread by Comrade Luo Ruiqing in Public Security Work".

relationships.target: 关于罗瑞卿错误问题的报告

description.zh-cn: 为报告撰写了附件文章《坚决保卫毛泽东思想，彻底粉碎罗瑞卿同志的资产阶级军事路线和篡军反党的阴谋》。
description.en: Authored an appended article for the report titled "Resolutely Defend Mao Zedong Thought and Thoroughly Smash Comrade Luo Ruiqing's Bourgeois Military Line and His Conspiracy to Usurp the Army and Oppose the Party".

relationships.target: 关于罗瑞卿错误问题的报告

description.zh-cn: 与王尚荣、雷英夫联名为报告撰写了附件文章《坚决捍卫伟大的毛泽东思想，彻底粉碎罗瑞卿同志篡军反党的阴谋》。
description.en: Co-authored with Wang Shangrong and Lei Yingfu an appended article for the report titled "Resolutely Defend the Great Mao Zedong Thought and Thoroughly Smash Comrade Luo Ruiqing's Conspiracy to Usurp the Army and Oppose the Party".

description.zh-cn: 林彪在九一三事件中乘机出逃时坠机身亡。
description.en: Lin Biao died in a plane crash while attempting to flee during the September 13 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后，邓小平上台主政，罗瑞卿得以平反。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution ended, Deng Xiaoping came to power, and Luo Ruiqing was rehabilitated.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东承认在罗瑞卿事件上听信林彪一面之辞犯了错误，此表态为罗瑞卿的最终平反创造了条件。
description.en: Mao Zedong admitted he had made a mistake in the Luo Ruiqing incident by listening to Lin Biao's one-sided account, which created the conditions for Luo's eventual rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东就罗瑞卿事件表态后，江青等人继续寻找借口，拖延对罗瑞卿的平反。
description.en: After Mao Zedong expressed his view on the Luo Ruiqing incident, Jiang Qing and others continued to find excuses to delay Luo's rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东就罗瑞卿事件表态后，康生等人继续寻找借口，拖延对罗瑞卿的平反。
description.en: After Mao Zedong expressed his view on the Luo Ruiqing incident, Kang Sheng and others continued to find excuses to delay Luo's rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿事件是“文化大革命”开始前的一次重要政治事件，被认为是文革的前奏。
description.en: The Luo Ruiqing Incident was a major political event before the start of the "Cultural Revolution" and is considered a prelude to it.
